articles.author: Shrishti Negi
articles.title: Jennifer Aniston Broke Down in Tears at Thought of 'Losing' Friends Co-star Matthew Perry | Video - News18
articles.description: Actor Matthew Perry, best known for his role as Chandler Bing in American sitcom 'Friends', died at the age of 54. His co-star Jennifer Aniston is 'devastated' by his death.
articles.content: Jennifer Aniston is reeling from the death of her Friends co-star Matthew Perry, who was found dead in a hot tub at his Los Angeles home on November 28. Nearly 20 years before Matthews death, Jennife… [+1362 chars]
